description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Do you love your HD TV? Of course you do, but your TV might not be displaying the entire input! Yaystuff gives you the weapons to calibrate your TV and reveal overscan problems. Getting informed is as easy as peering through your sniper scope of overscan doom! If you don't like what you see, you can always just pull the trigger.
description.short: Do you love your HD TV? Of course you do, but your TV might not be displaying the entire input! Yaystuff gives you the weapons to calibrate your TV and reveal overscan problems. Getting informed is as easy as peering through your sniper scope of overscan doom! If you don't like what you see, you can always just pull the trigger.
